nodes.text: The Lyjdaa system was a star system where Squadron Five of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing took severe casualties around six months before the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. In the aftermath of the losses, Commander Teso Broosh transferred to Squadron Five as its new squadron commander, at the request of the 204th's Major Soran Keize.
The Lyjdaa system was mentioned in a flashback sequence of the comic book TIE Fighter 3, written by Jody Houser and published on June 19, 2019.
